article.citation: Martin PM, Gopal E, Ananth S, Zhuang L, Itagaki S, Prasad BM, Smith SB, Prasad PD, Ganapathy V: Identity of SMCT1 (SLC5A8) as a neuron-specific Na+-coupled transporter for active uptake of L-lactate and ketone bodies in the brain. J Neurochem. 2006 Jul;98(1):279-88.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as short-chain keto acids and derivatives. These are keto acids with an alkyl chain the contains less than 6 carbon atoms.

target.name: Deacetoxycephalosporin C synthase
target.organism: Streptomyces clavuligerus (strain ATCC 27064 / DSM 738 / JCM 4710 / NBRC 13307 / NCIMB 12785 / NRRL 3585 / VKM Ac-602)

article.citation: Overington JP, Al-Lazikani B, Hopkins AL: How many drug targets are there? Nat Rev Drug Discov. 2006 Dec;5(12):993-6.
Imming P, Sinning C, Meyer A: Drugs, their targets and the nature and number of drug targets. Nat Rev Drug Discov. 2006 Oct;5(10):821-34.

polypeptide.name: Deacetoxycephalosporin C synthase
polypeptide.specific-function: Catalyzes the step from penicillin N to deacetoxy-cephalosporin C.
polypeptide.organism: Streptomyces clavuligerus (strain ATCC 27064 / DSM 738 / JCM 4710 / NBRC 13307 / NCIMB 12785 / NRRL 3585 / VKM Ac-602)

article.citation: Overington JP, Al-Lazikani B, Hopkins AL: How many drug targets are there? Nat Rev Drug Discov. 2006 Dec;5(12):993-6.
Imming P, Sinning C, Meyer A: Drugs, their targets and the nature and number of drug targets. Nat Rev Drug Discov. 2006 Oct;5(10):821-34.

polypeptide.name: D-2-hydroxyisocaproate dehydrogenase
polypeptide.general-function: Oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-oh group of donors, nad or nadp as acceptor
polypeptide.specific-function: Catalyzes the NAD dependent reversible, stereospecific interconversion between 2-ketocarboxylic acids and D-2-hydroxy-carboxylic acids.

go-classifier.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the CH-OH group of donors, NAD or NADP as acceptor
